title: Jeff Grubb: The wait for new consoles is causing some people to lose their minds to the point that they believe Burger King is going to show off the PS5 UI.

author: Ghostwriterwriter
text:
I'll be honest, I'm pretty antsy waiting for my PS5.

But I know after playing spiderman for awhile I'll be like "so...now what."

author: UncleDanko
text: there are so many games coming out.. not finding something to play.. is.. well.. kinda.. unlikely

author: Ghostwriterwriter
text:
there's like 10 PS5 launch titles or something like that. Spiderman is the best. The rest look shit (personal opinion). GT7 and ratchet and clank aren't coming out in November. Assassins Creed looks shit.

so...it's...not...kinda...unlikely.

author: Oreo_
text: Cyberpunk no interest to you? Just because its not exclusive doesn't mean its not a launch title

author: lelieldirac
text: I mean by this logic you could say “What do you mean there’s nothing on PS5? Just look at all these compatible PS4 games”

author: Oreo_
text: What? Lmao no a brand new game thats cross platform is not the same thing as a last generation game

author: lelieldirac
text: Oh silly me, I almost confused a “cross platform” game that was developed for last generation hardware and has marginal performance improvements for a “last generation” game. I must have been thrown off by it playing and looking practically identical between systems

author: lelieldirac
text: Is this how you usually wriggle your way out of arguments you’re losing? cute

author: UncleDanko
text: Sorry but why does it matter? Its a new game a new experience and if it runs on old gen has what todo with a games quality? Yeah zero. The PC version already shows where the game is heading once patched, so the identical look is a mood one.

author: lelieldirac
text: No where did I say it was a bad thing
